MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY1: We didn't find any technical issues.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY3: We noticed that your router is not capable of handling high internet speed. You may be facing issue of slow browsing due to this. Its highly recommended to upgrade your router for better experience and elimination of repeated internet issues

MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY5: Tap 'Continue to troubleshooting' if there is a specific technical issue, or ‘View Details’ to take a closer look at your internet service.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY6: We noticed that the internet speed you have is incapable of handling your usage. You may be facing issue of slow browsing due to this. It is highly recommended to upgrade your package for better experience and elimination of repeated internet issues.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY7: Tap “Upgrade Package” if you wish to upgrade the router
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY8: We noticed that your router is not capable to handle high internet speed. Beside this you have an Internet speed that is incapable of handling your usage. You may be facing issue of slow browsing due to this. It is highly recommended to upgrade both your Router and your package for better experience and elimination of repeated internet issues.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY9: Tap “Upgrade Router &  Package” if you wish to upgrade the router

MESSAGES.ELIFE_UPGRADE_SUCCESS: eLife package upgrade request was raised successfully
MESSAGES.WE_HAVE_RECEIVED_YOUR_COMPLAINT_AND_BOOK: We have received your complaint and booked an appointment.  Our technician will contact you soon.
MESSAGES.YOU_ARE_CURRENTLY_USING_AN_ETISALAT_ROUT: You are currently using an Etisalat router. We can provide remote support if you continue using this router.
MESSAGES.HOWEVER_THIS_SERVICE_WILL_NOT_BE_AVAILAB: However, this service will not be available if you install a third-party router.
MESSAGES.YOU_NEED_TO_RESET_YOUR_INTERNET_PASSWORD: you need to reset your internet password to install the third-party router
MESSAGES.ENTER_YOUR_MOBILE_NUMBER_TO_RECEIVE_THE_: Enter your mobile number to receive the new PIN via SMS
MESSAGES.INSTALLATION_OF_ROUTER_IS_IN_PROGESS..._: Installation of router is in progess... it will take up to 30 minutes.
MESSAGES.CONNECT_THE_NEW_ROUTER_TO_X_PORT_OF_THE_: Connect the new router to 'X' port of the wall-mounted fiber box
MESSAGES.SET_THE_ROUTER_WITH_A_NEW_PASSWORD: Set the router with a new password
MESSAGES.WAIT_FOR_5_MINUTES_THE_ROUTER_WILL_BE_CO: Wait for 5 minutes. The router will be configured with new password automatically and you will be able to use Internet service normally
MESSAGES.HERE_ARE_THE_DETAILS_OF_YOUR_REQUEST: Here are the details of your request:
MESSAGES.PLEASE_WAIT_..._YOUR_REQUEST_WILL_BE_PRO: Please wait... Your request will be processed soon.
MESSAGES.THERE_IS_ALREADY_AN_APPOINTMENT_SCHEDULE: There is already an appointment scheduled for providing the service
MESSAGES.YOUR_APPOINTMENT_HAS_BEEN_CHANGED_SUCCES: Your appointment has been changed successfully. Thank you for using our technical support.
MESSAGES.THIS_SERVICE_IS_COMING_TO_YOUR_AREA_SOON: This service is coming to your area soon. Our team will contact you once it is available.
MESSAGES.THERE_IS_SOME_WORK_PENDING_FROM_YOUR_SID: There is some work pending from your side. Please tap 'Set an appointment' if you have already completed it.
MESSAGES.SORRY_TRANSFER_OF_PACKAGE_IS_NOT_APPLICA: Sorry, transfer of package is not applicable as you don't have additional STB
MESSAGES.YOU_ARE_SUBSCRIBED_FOR_SHARED_TV_PACKAGE: You are subscribed for shared TV packages that can be viewed from all your STBs
